title: Origami Crane
description: The origami crane is a symbol of peace and hope. It is one of the most famous and beautiful origami models in the world.

title: Origami Heart
description: Origami heart represents love, care, and friendship. Perfect for gifts and greeting cards.

title: Origami Frog
description: A fun jumping frog model loved by kids. It improves creativity and motor coordination.

title: Origami Butterfly
description: The origami butterfly symbolizes transformation, beauty, and freedom.

title: Origami Star
description: A simple, decorative paper star folded using origami techniques, perfect for crafts or festive decorations.
